T02D3680:311a-1: t'a r'a aa gr'a pr'apti n'a ma /
T02D3680:311a-3: sgrol ma mchog thob pa zhes bya ba /
T02D3680:311a-4: rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3680:311a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid kyi bar bsgoms te /
T02D3680:311a-6: skad cig la rang sgrol mar bsgoms pa'i thugs kar
T02D3680:311a-7: t'am aindra n'i la'i mdog lta bu blta bar bya'o
T02D3680:311a-8: // lus skyil krung la tshigs drang por bsrang ste
T02D3680:311a-9: mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya la sogs te lus gnad
T02D3680:311a-10: lnga dang ldan pas rlung rgyu ba spangs te lte
T02D3680:311a-11: ba las me rab tu sbar nas /
T02D3680:311a-12: spyi gtsug nas thig le phab ste t'am la phog
T02D3680:311a-13: / t'am las byang chub kyi sems zhun tshul du
T02D3680:311a-14: lus thams cad la khyab pas bde ba chen po'i
T02D3680:311a-15: ting nge 'dzin skyes par bsam zhing srog rtsol la
T02D3680:311a-16: 'bad na zhag bdun gyis dngos su skye bar 'gyur
T02D3680:311a-17: te / byang sems 'dzag na gdams ngag dran par bya /
T02D3680:311a-18: de nas t'am las 'od 'phros te snod bcud thams
T02D3680:311a-19: cad rang la bsdus rang yang t'am las bsdus te
T02D3680:311a-20: t'am yang rim gyis mi dmigs par byas la yod
T02D3680:311a-21: pa dang med pa'i rtog pa spangs la /
T02D3680:311a-22: stong pa nyid kyi bde ba la rgyas gdab po //
T02D3680:311a-23: rtog pa la shes pa 'phro na snga ma ltar bde ba bsgom /
T02D3680:311a-24: bde ba shas chen phyi ma ltar stong pa bsgom /
T02D3680:311a-25: rtog pa gzhan 'brel pa spang ste zla ba drug tu bsgoms na mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3680:311a-26: sgrol ma mchog sgrub pa zhes bya ba dngos grub
